translation:
I have passed without major news, despite severe headaches yesterday and today.

Tomorrow I suppose our electoral work will end, and if possible I intend to return on Thursday or Friday. A hug to our Mingote and Bernardino, whom I have missed very much, and I wish to already embrace my Mingote.

Recommendations to the comadre, compadres, and everyone in general.

Your old friend from the heart, Almeida. Rio Grande, October 21, 1828.

To Mrs. Bernardina Barcelos de Almeida. Pelotas.
